name: Untitled Platforming Game
description:
This is a simple Platforming Game. You can walk(slide),  jump, dash, press buttons and collect stuff. The goal is to collect all the keys to open the big door.  You can try to collect the blue gems if you want to 100% the game or you can speed run the game.

-Story-

You are a cube creature that find yourself stuck in some kind of dungeon. You try to escape and find a big door with 5 locks. You assume that is the exit so you try to find the keys.

-Controls-

movement: AD or Right/Left arrow keys

Jump: W or Up arrow key or Space

Dash: Left Shift

**double jump and dash have to be unlocked

Grab/Release Blocks: E

Quit: Escape
